title: Suggestion for Taric's Ult, relevant to his identity
body: Every ally he saves with his Ult *(those who were immune to enough damage that would've killed them by the time they leave combat)* Taric gains a stack displayed as a buff which states something to the effect of "Lives saved by the Shield of Valoran". No combat stats or effect, just flavor text.

replies.body:
Protector (buff): No stats.
"Outrageous. Truly outrageous."

And then it gains one "truly" for every life he saves.
